attributes.action: Introduce 'No Smoking Areas' in the 6 towns of Stoke-on-Trent
attributes.background: The Potteries 6 towns have become NO GO areas for the vast majority of non-smokers who would visit and shop in Hanley Burslem Tunstall Longton Fenton and Stoke. 'Smoking Free Areas' should be created in all 6 town centers and policed in the same way drinking alcohol is enforced in a firm handed way

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You've asked for action to be taken specifically in your local area, not across the country, so this would be a decision for your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://www.stoke.gov.uk/ccm/content/council-and-democracy/member-services/council-and-committee-meetings-cat/petitions.en
